json: {"add_total_row": 1, "sort_by": "Sales Order.status", "add_totals_row": true, "sort_order": "desc", "sort_by_next": null, "filters": [["Sales Order", "docstatus", "!=", "2"]], "sort_order_next": "desc", "columns": [["name", "Sales Order"], ["transaction_date", "Sales Order"], ["customer_name", "Sales Order"], ["grand_total", "Sales Order"], ["total_taxes_and_charges", "Sales Order"], ["status", "Sales Order"]]}
name: Sales Invoice Report
query:
SELECT
  `tabSales Order`.name as "Sales Order:Link/Sales Order:200"
FROM
  `tabSales Order`
WHERE
  `tabSales Order`.docstatus=1
